scripts.release:check: pnpm build && pnpm test && pnpm lint
scripts.verify:pack: bash -lc 'set -euo pipefail; TMP=.tmp/pack; rm -rf "$TMP"; mkdir -p "$TMP"; pnpm --dir packages/core pack --pack-destination "$TMP" >/dev/null; pnpm --dir mcp-server pack --pack-destination "$TMP" >/dev/null; rm -rf "$TMP"'
